body.name: Dash Clear View Toaster: Extra Wide Slot Toaster with See Through Window - Defrost, Reheat + Auto Shut Off Feature for Bagels, Specialty Breads & other Baked Goods - Red
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 45 mins
features: MORE THAN TOAST: Defrost, Reheat, and Bagel one-touch buttons allow you to diversify your breakfast. Extra wide slot makes toasting bagels, specialty breads, waffles, and other baked goods a snap
SEE THROUGH WINDOW: 7 browning levels and the clear view window allow for that perfect toast with every use; plus, the auto-shut off feature prevents overheating
QUICK + EASY: The crumb tray and glass window slide out for quick and easy clean up. The outer surfaces all wipe-clean
PERFECT GIFT: The perfect wedding or new home gift Its small size takes up little counter space, and its sleek design and trendy color options will match any kitchen décor (add to your registry now)
INCLUDES: DASH Clear View Toaster includes recipe book and recipe database access (all non-electric parts are easily wiped clean)
body.description: With 7 browning levels and a clear-view window, the Dash Clear View Toaster takes the guesswork out of toasting. See for yourself through the window as your toast is cooked to your exact preference! With 1-touch defrost, reheat, and bagel functions, the toaster handles a variety of specialty breads and baked goods. The auto-shut off feature prevents burning, and the crumb tray and glass window slide out for easy cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars See Your Toast Toast with Dash!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the DASH Clear View Toaster and it has quickly become a staple in my kitchen. This toaster is not only aesthetically pleasing with its modern design but also highly functional. The extra-wide slots are perfect for bagels and other specialty breads, which is a major plus for our family as we enjoy a variety of bread. The see-through window is a genius feature that allows me to monitor my toast, ensuring it's toasted to my liking every time.The 7-level browning control provides a good range of toasting options, from lightly toasted to crispy, catering to different family members' preferences. I also appreciate the one-button defrost, bagel, and reheat functions which make it convenient to use. The slide-out crumb tray has made cleaning a breeze and the auto-shut off feature is great for safety, especially on busy mornings when I'm in a hurry.The toaster has a power consumption of 1100 W which means it toasts quickly, saving me time in the morning. I've received compliments on how this toaster looks and functions, and it definitely stands out on my kitchen counter.My only minor gripe is that not all bread types toast at the same pace due to their different densities, but with a little trial and error, I've managed to find the perfect setting for all my toasting needs. I would highly recommend the DASH Clear View Toaster to anyone looking for a stylish and effective toaster that delivers on its promises. It's definitely a great bang for your buck!The DASH Clear View Toaster has received favorable reviews on various platforms including Amazon and Walmart, with customers appreciating its functionality, aesthetics, and the unique see-through window feature that allows monitoring of the toasting process. Users have also mentioned the convenience of having extra-wide slots for different bread types and the ease of cleaning due to the slide-out crumb tray. Overall, it's considered a great value for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unexpectedly, I LOVE This Toaster!
reviews.reviewText: Let’s be real, we are talking about a toaster, a TOASTER! Why should anyone want to write a review of the most used and easiest to forget ancillary appliance you own? Because the Dash Clear View Toaster is that awesome!The short of it; don’t waste your time looking for anything else. This toaster can handle anything you throw at it with golden brown perfection, quickly. The Dash Clear View Toaster is the best bang for your buck, hands down!The long of it. We are a “somewhat” healthy eating family. We run the gambit when it comes to bread choices. Hardly ever white, mostly wheat for the kids, and tapioca and/or rice bread for the adults. Not all breads toast to perfection at the same rate. Each one of these breads has a very specific heat tolerance that can make for difficult toasting times. And that’s where the window really comes in handy.With the Dash Clear View Toaster you can sit back and enjoy the toasting experience all while watching the progress through its’ front window. Gone are the days of premature toast ejection just to check on the “doneness” of a specific bread only to have to reinsert the payload back into the heated bay. Visible perfection each and every time.With the white or Tapioca bread, which toast rather quickly, a quick turn to 4 gives us the perfect amount of crunch. The wheat bread takes slightly longer, about a 5 to a 5.5 max. And then there is the ALWAYS FROZEN rice bread. This beast of a bread (Food for Life brand) is twice toasted. Once as a 7 with “defrost” selected and a second plunge at a 7 without the “defrost” selected. AMAZING!The controls are easy to understand, clearly marked and simple to operate. Plug it in, place the toast in the slot provided, push down the plunger and away you go. It takes a matter of a use or two to figure out the proper settings to your liking.The “defrost” feature just doubles the time on the dial. The “bagel” feature only toasts on one side. With some sandwich breads like rye / pumpernickel etc. that have a tendency to toast really well and tear-up the roof of your mouth I like to use the bagel setting. Put the toasted side to the inside (meat side) and the soft untoasted side to the outside, you get the crunch without tearing up the roof of your mouth. AWESOMNESS!I have yet to use the “re-heat” feature … so you are on your own with that one. Sorry Charlie.As far as the toast rocketing from the toaster with the velocity of an unladen swallow, African or Eurpean – doesn’t matter, I have found that to be inconsequential. Does it pop up and sometime flop out on its own? Yes, rarely. But that has happened with my old toaster as well (a re-gifted 2 slice Panasonic that we got as a wedding gift 22 years ago). So really I kind of like the nostalgia of it when it does happen. BONUS! Let’s just hope that I get 22 years out of this amazing beast.So in conclusion, I just wrote an essay on a toaster. What the hell am I thinking?! Yes, it is that great. Click the “Add to Cart” button and get the Dash Clear View Toaster. You will not regret yourself for doing so, unlike your college spring break weekend. Love you son!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and effective, but one caveat
reviews.reviewText: Love the clear view front and the exact dial. Makes great toast and awesome that you can toast extra wide slices. However, the grates don't clamp as tightly as I'd like at the bottom. With thinner breads, like half an English muffin, the bread will sort of sag and come out bent or curved.

reviews.reviewTitle: The window does make it GREAT!
reviews.reviewText: Toasts fast and I like the widow. I can have my toast exactly the way I like it. Plus it looks great on the counter..

reviews.reviewTitle: Ni barato ni caro pero buenissimo
reviews.reviewText: ¡Por fin! Pan artesanal, baguette de madre masa, cualquier pan, tostado exactamento como quiero. No esperes más. compralo
Amazing product. Very easy to use and you can do so much from a toaster
Excelente tostador, es nuy rápido y me gusto que tiene niveles para tostar

reviews.reviewTitle: Loving this new long slice, wide opening toaster
reviews.reviewText: Cool wall design. Visible toasting through side window. Brown, sour dough and bagels all toasted very well according to the setting guide and my toast "doneness" choice. Slim profile fits easily in the smallish galley kitchen. I have found a replacement for the Braun, finally.
